title: No service on Punggol LRT due to a power fault

updates.text: Punggol LRT service has fully resumed since 12.38pm. Free regular and bridging bus services have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Punggol LRT service has fully resumed at 12.38pm. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available.
One direction of the Punggol East & West Loop LRT service has resumed at 12.35pm.
No service on Punggol LRT due to a power fault. Free regular and bridging bus services are available at designated stops.
